long_description: Designed to raise the temperature performance of your cot by 10-15deg the Therm-a-Rest LuxuryLite Cot Warmer captures and retains your body heat for extra warmth when you sleep under the stars. ThermaCapture(TM) Radian Heat Technology reflects radiant heat back to your body, amplifying warmth without adding bulk or weight. Lightweight, packable cot attaches easily to the underside of your cot with 6 ealsticized hooks. Therm-a-Rest LuxuryLite Cot Warmer includes a stuff sack.
